title: Record oil output cuts fail to make waves in coronavirus-hit market

title: Factbox: Non OPEC+ crude oil supply cuts
text: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries and its allies, known as OPEC+, agreed on Sunday to reduce output by 9.7 million barrels per day (bpd) for May and June in an effort to prop up oil prices as the coronavirus outbreak slashes fuel demand.

title: OPEC+ to Cut Oil Production by Nearly 10 Million Barrels per Day

title: The Big Deal to Cut Oil Production May Not Be Big Enough
